genresAdvancedInfo.name: deep hardtechno
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Deep hardtechno is a subgenre of techno that is characterized by its hard-hitting beats and dark, industrial soundscapes. It often features distorted basslines, aggressive percussion, and intense synth lines. This music is designed to be played at high volumes in underground clubs and warehouses, where the energy of the crowd is just as important as the music itself.
